attributes.action: Make Friday a homework day at school
attributes.background: So children who haven’t got time to do there homework at home or are to busy have a day at school to complete there homework

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the schedule for school days are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban schools from setting more than seven pieces of homework a week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/651156

Change the school week to a four day week: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
